resources.string: + Added support for jabber.org and etc.\n- Support for gmail.com disabled
+ Added support for Gtalk, Facebook chat, LiveJournal chat, QIP.ru, Ya.Online, Vkontakte chat.
+ Multiple chat and authorisation fixes.
+ Disconnect issues on network changes fixed a bit.
Merry Christmas!
+ German Language translation\n+ TLS option\n+ Chat has beed sped up significantly.

+ Compression support.
+ "Send message by Enter" option
+ Сontact list fixed
+ Fixed vibro and light indication for some phones
+ Message receive fix\n+ Reconnection on network change fix
+ Design optimization\n+ Connection indicator\n+ Chat design fix
+ Timeout for compressed session fix
+ Hi-res Icons\n+ Compression options.
+ Color themes

+ Chat switching by gestures
+ Option to turn off smiles/emoticons
+ Option to change status on screen switching-off
+ Compress and TLS issues fixed
+ Connection with jabberd2 servers fixed
+ Gesture switching fixed

+ Unstable multi user chat support (MUC)
+ Option to notify about incoming messages
+ Option to hide persistent notification
* Heavily updated English and Russian translations
* Menu rearranged
* Chat's notification fix
* Minor fixes in MUC\n* Add account wizard improved\n* Status change window improved
+ Space rocket on icon dedicated to 50th anniversary of first manned space flight by Yuri Gagarin (12.04.1961)

+ French translation (thank you, Charlie Huriel!)
* Minor fixes in German translation
* Chat input box mad cursor fix
* Speedup chat with long message history
* Minor fixes in chat
* Minor fixes in notification bar
* Fix message duplication in MUC
+ Аccount type "Google Talk for Domains" added\n* Screen orientation change bug fixed

+ Installation on SD card
+ Option to notify on incoming messages in open chat
* Reduced traffic usage
* Reconnection issues fix
* Memory leak fix
* German translation fix (thank you, Niklas Casper, Sven Rohweder, Sven Henze, Julian Berkner)
* Fixed work with the conferences

* Fixed account settings update
* Fixed notification about incoming messages
* Minor fixes in chat
NB: You will probably have to recreate shortcut for Xabber after update
* Fix project version
+ SRV records support\n* Experimental geolocation functions are turned off for a while

+ Start at phone boot option
+ Contact search
+ "Always show offline contacts" option for specified groups
+ "Away" status after specified timeout
* Reconnection improved
* Persistent contact list, does not disappear while disconnected
* Contact list and chat scrolling speed improved
* Disconnected rooms in contact list are always shown
* Adding contacts menu fixed
* Fixed vibro for some phones
* Minor fixes in chat
* Minor chat fixes
* Minor chat fixes
* Fixed statuses for some servers
* Minor contact list fixes
* Displaying non-group contacts fixed \n* Fail on some devices fixed

+ Polish translation (thank you, Qrix!)
+ Export message history to SD card
+ "Don't use SASL Authentication" option for old servers
+ Close all chats button
+ Hide keyboard after send message option
* Icons updated
* Adding contact dialog improved
* Reconnection improved
* Displaying offline contacts fixed
* Vibration bug fixed
If vibro does not work please check phone settings or enable option: Settings - Notifications - Ignore system vibro settings.
* Chat switch fixed
* Minor packet processing fix
+ Option to hide state change in conferences\n* Minor bug fix in chat
* Critical reconnect loop bug fixed\n* Minor fixes

+ Design update
+ Hardware search button support
* Unreasonable disconnect error fixed
* Export large message history fixed
* Minor fixes
NB: New permission needed for better connection management

+ Windows Live Messenger support (Android 2.2 or higher required)
+ Odnoklassniki support
+ Prevent WiFi from been disabled
+ Move "Close all chats" to the option menu
* Fixed notifications on Android 4.0.3+
* Minor fixes
NB: Preventing WiFi from been disabled will reduce battery life. You can disable this function in application settings.
* Notification bugfix

* "Use custom host" connection option fixed
* Black screen on clear notification fixed
+ Integration into Android accounts and contacts
+ Share using Xabber
+ Quick contacts in Xabber
+ Focus on input field when opening chat
+ Do not keep password option
+ Merge "Google Talk" and "Google Talk for Domains" account types
+ Xabber is now available on Amazon Appstore
NB: New permissions will be required.
* Open chat from system contact list fixed
* Suggestion to enable integration with system contacts fixed\n* Minor fixes

+ View contact's information (vCard and online resourses)
+ Show contact's client software in contact list
+ Option to notify on the first message only in a chat
+ Option not to show message text in notification area
+ Option to reset “Show offline contacts” settings
+ Ping support
+ Icon in honor of International Workers' Day
* Minor fixes
* Minor contact list fixes

+ Customize font size in chat
+ Notification options for each contact
+ Typing-notification
+ Shortcut to a chat on home screen
+ Displaying a message on a new line option
* Chat speedup
* Chat scrolling fixed
* Notifications fixed
* Minor fixes
* Loading invalid avatars fixed\n* Minor fixes
* Authorization for Windows Live Messenger fixed\n* Minor fixes
* Chat scrolling issue fixed\n* Minor fixes
* Chat scrolling issue fixed\n* Minor fixes
* Chat scrolling issue fixed\n* Minor fixes
* Chat scrolling issue fixed\n* Minor fixes

+ OTR (Off-The-Record) encryption support
+ Check for the server certificate option
+ Legacy SSL authorization option
+ Message delivery receipts
+ Vibro settings for each chat
+ Activity based statuses improved
+ Status based priority support
* Fixed connection issues for Windows Live Messenger (MSN) and vk chat
* Notification icons for Android 4+ fixed
* SRV lookup and DNS round robin improved
* Translations fixed (Thank you folks!)
+ Vote for open source

+ Message archive support (Plug-in for Prosody is recommended on server side)
+ Per account history settings
+ Copy OTR fingerprint to the clipboard
+ Dutch and Turkish translations
* Reduce traffic on reconnection
* Notifications in conferences fixed
* Active chat list fixed
* Message delivery receipts fixed
* Multiple translations fixed
Thanks for your help!
* Minor fixes

* Contact's client indication fixed
* Typing notifications fixed
* OTR verification with question fixed
* Minor fixes
* Server certificate validation fixed\n* Minor fixes
+ Slovak translation (thank you, Dominik!)\n* Server certificate validation fixed\n* Minor fixes

+ Czech translations
+ Call attention feature
+ Notifications based on key phrase
+ Option to disable typing notifications
+ List of occupants in a chat room (view only)
* Multiple minor fixes
* Multiple translations fixed
Thank you folks!
+ Source Codes of Xabber are now available on GitHub\n* Multiple minor fixes
Initial release
First update
+ Status saved between sessions
+ Debug mode fix
+ Now runs as a service
+ No sound on each notification
+ Notifications are stored in database\n+ Synchronization fix\n+ Soft keyboard show/hide now scrolls chat window properly

+ 48 unique default avatars
+ Groups in contact list
+ Preferences menu
+ Account types
+ Interface tweaks

+ Optimized user interface
+ Sort in contact list is now case insensitive
+ Facebook chat account type
+ Option to hide avatar in title of chat
+ Accounts are optionally Enabled/Disabled
+ Interface tweaks
- Geolocation functions disabled (for now)
- Removed unsupported account types\n+ Long tap on "add account" button fixed
- Removed context menu to go online/offline
+ App name change\n+ Data structure optimized\n+ Multiple fixes and updates
+ Clear history according settings\n+ Last message for contacts optimized
+ Expanding operations fix

+ Context menu to quote chat message and to repeat send
+ Copy and paste chat message, clear message text
+ Remove selected chat message from history.
+ Chat with disconnected contacts fixed
+ Emoticon support
+ Typed but not sent text is now saved\n+ Icons to display message status

+ Support for googlemail.com added
+ Custom sound notifications
+ Chat switching by gestures (experimental)
+ Internal fixes.
+ Bugs with chat input fixed
+ English is now default language\n+ Some changes in user interface

+ Support for most Jabber servers
+ Fixed error in cs locale
+ Minor bugfixes
+ Merry Christmas!

+ TLS option
+ Compression support
+ "Send message by Enter" option
+ Connection indicator
+ German language
+ Chat sped up significantly
+ Contact list fix
+ Vibro and light indication for some phones fix
+ Message receive fix
+ Reconnection on network change fix
+ Hi-res icons\n+ Compression options
+ Color themes

+ Chat switching by gestures
+ Option to turn off smiles/emoticons
+ Option to change status on screen switching-off
* Compress and TLS issues fixed
* Connection with jabberd2 servers fixed

+ Space rocket on icon dedicated to 50th anniversary of first manned space flight by Yuri Gagarin (12.04.1961)
+ Basic multi user chat support (MUC)
+ Option to notify about incoming messages
+ Option to hide persistent notification
* Heavily updated English and Russian translations
* Menu rearranged
* Chat's notification fix
* Add account wizard improved
* Status change window improved

+ French translation (thank you, Charlie Huriel!)
+ Аccount type "Google Talk for Domains" added
* Chat input box mad cursor fix
* Speedup chat with long message history
* Minor fixes in chat
* Minor fixes in notification bar
* Fix message duplication in MUC
* Screen orientation change bug fixed

+ Installation on SD card
+ Option to notify on incoming messages in open chat
* Reduced traffic usage
* Reconnection issues fix
* Memory leak fix
* Fixed work with the conferences
* Fixed account settings update
* Fixed notification about incoming messages
* Minor fixes in chat
* German translation fix (thank you, Niklas Casper, Sven Rohweder, Sven Henze, Julian Berkner)
+ SRV records support\n* Geolocation function is temporarily disabled.

+ Start at phone boot option
+ Contact search
+ "Always show offline contacts" option for specified groups
+ "Away" status after specified timeout
* Reconnection improved
* Persistent contact list, does not disappear while disconnected
* Contact list and chat scrolling speed improved
* Disconnected rooms in contact list are always shown
* Adding contacts menu fixed
* Fixed vibro for some phones

+ Export message history to SD card

+ Close all chats option
+ Hide keyboard after send message option

* Reconnection improved

* Vibration bug fixed
If vibro does not work please check phone settings or enable option: Settings - Notifications - Ignore system vibro settings.
+ Option to hide state change in conferences\n* Minor bug fix in chat\n* Minor packet processing fix
* Critical reconnect loop bug fixed\n* Minor fixes

+ Design update
+ Hardware search button support
* Unreasonable disconnect error fixed
* Export large message history fixed

NB: New permission needed for better connection management

+ Windows Live Messenger support (Android 2.2 or higher required)
+ Odnoklassniki support
+ Prevent WiFi from been disabled
+ Move "Close all chats" to the option menu
* Fixed notifications on Android 4.0.3+
* Minor fixes
NB: Preventing WiFi from been disabled will reduce battery life. You can disable this function in application settings.

+ Integration into Android accounts and contacts
+ Share using Xabber
+ Quick contacts in Xabber
+ Focus on input field when opening chat
+ Do not keep password option
+ Merge "Google Talk" and "Google Talk for Domains" account types
+ Icon in honor of International Workers' Day
* "Use custom host" connection option fixed
* Black screen on clear notification fixed
NB: New permissions will be required.
* Minor fix for vip version

+ View contact's information (vCard and online resourses)
+ Show contact's client software icon in contact list
+ Now everybody can see, that you are using Xabber VIP version :)
+ Option to notify on the first message only in a chat
+ Option not to show message text in notification area
+ Option to reset “Show offline contacts” settings
+ Ping support
* Minor fixes

+ Customize font size in chat
+ Notification options for each contact
+ Typing-notification
+ Shortcut to a chat on home screen
+ Displaying a message on a new line option
* Chat speedup
* Chat scrolling fixed
* Notifications fixed
* Loading invalid avatars fixed
* Minor fixes
* Chat scrolling issue fixed\n* Minor fixes
* Chat scrolling issue fixed\n* Minor fixes
* Chat scrolling issue fixed\n* Minor fixes

+ OTR (Off-The-Record) encryption support
+ Check for the server certificate option
+ Legacy SSL authorization option
+ Message delivery receipts
+ Vibro settings for each chat
+ Activity based statuses improved
+ Status based priority support
* Fixed connection issues for Windows Live Messenger (MSN) and vk chat
* Notification icons for Android 4+ fixed
* SRV lookup and DNS round robin improved
* Translations fixed (Thank you folks!)
+ Vote for open source

Merry Christmas!
+ Dutch, Slovak, Turkish, Chinese translations
+ Message archive support (Prosody plug-in is recommended on the server side)
+ Per account history settings
+ Copy OTR fingerprint to the clipboard
* Server certificate validation fixed
* Reduced reconnection traffic
* Notifications in conferences fixed
* List of active chat fixed
* Message delivery receipts fixed
* Typing notifications fixed
* Minor fixes
* Multiple translations fixed
Thank you guys!
We are happy to announce that source code of Xabber will be released in January 2013 under GNU GPLv3 license!\n\nMerry Christmas everyone!

+ Source Codes of Xabber are now available on GitHub
+ Czech translations
+ Call attention feature
+ Notifications based on key phrase
+ Option to disable typing notifications
+ List of occupants in a chat room (view only)
* Multiple minor fixes
* Multiple translations fixed
Thank you folks!
